Verses: 1 sandaiyodu Koodiya Veeduniraindha Kozhumaiyaana Padhaarththangalaip Paarkkilum, Amarikkaiyode Saappidum Verum Thunikkaiye Nalam.
2 buththiyulla Velaikkaaran Lachchaiyundaakkugira Puththiranai Aandu, Sagodhararukkulla Sudhandharaththil Pangadaivaan.
3 velliyaik Kugaiyum, Ponnaip Pudamum Sodhikkum; Irudhayangalai Sodhikkiravaro Karththar.
4 dhushtan Akkirama Udhadugal Solvadhai Utrukketkiraan; Poiyan Kedulla Naavukku Sevikodukkiraan.
5 ezhaiyaip Pariyaasam Pannugiravan Avanai Undaakkinavarai Nindhikkiraan; Aabaththaikkuriththuk Kalikkiravan Thandanaikkuth Thappaan.
6 pillaigalin Pillaigal Mudhiyorukku Kreedam; Pillaigalin Menmai Avargal Pidhaakkale.
7 menmaiyaanavaigalaip Pesum Udhadu Moodanukkuth Thagaadhu; Poi Pesum Udhadu Prabuvukku Evvalavenum Thagaadhu.
8 paridhaanam Vaangugiravargalin Paarvaikku Adhu Raththinampolirukkum; Adhu Nokkum Thisaiyellaam Kaariyam Vaaikkum.
9 kutraththai Moodugiravan Snegaththai Naadugiraan; Kettadhai Sollugiravan Praanasnegidharaiyum Piriththuvidugiraan.
10 moodanai Nooradi Adippadhaippaarkkilum, Buththimaanai Vaayinaal Kandippadhe Adhigamaai Uraikkum.
11 dhushtan Kalagaththaiye Thedugiraan; Kurooradhoodhan Avanukku Virodhamaaga Anuppappaduvaan.
12 than Madhikettil Thiriyum Madhiyeenanukku Edhirppaduvadhaippaarkkilum, Kuttigalaip Parikoduththa Karadikku Edhirppaduvadhu Vaasi.
13 nanmaikkuth Theemaiseygiravan Evano, Avan Veettaivittuth Theemai Neengaadhu.
14 sandaiyin Aarambam Madhagaith Thirandhuvidugiradhupolirukkum; Aadhalaal Vivaadham Ezhumbumun Adhai Vittuvidu.
15 dhunmaarkkanai Needhimaanaakkugiravanum, Needhimaanaik Kutravaaliyaakkugiravanumaagiya Ivviruvarum Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanavargal
16 gnaanaththaik Kollumpadi Moodan Kaiyile Rokkam Ennaththirku? Adhinmel Avanukku Manamillaiye.
17 snegidhan Ellaak Kaalaththilum Snegippaan; Idukkanil Udhavave Sagodharan Pirandhirukkiraan.
18 buththiyeenan Than Snegidhanukku Munbaagak Kaiyadiththukkoduththup Pinaippadugiraan.
19 vaadhuppiriyan Paadhagappiriyan; Than Vaasalai Uyarththik Kattugiravan Azhivai Naadugiraan.
20 maarupaadaana Irudhayamullavan Nanmaiyaik Kandadaivadhillai; Purattu Naavullavan Theemaiyil Vizhuvaan.
21 moodapuththiranaip Perugiravan Thanakku Sanjalamundaaga Avanaip Perugiraan; Madhiyeenanudaiya Thagappanukku Magizhchchiyillai.
22 manamagizhchchi Nalla Oushadham; Murindha Aaviyo Elumbugalai Ularappannum.
23 dhunmaarkkan, Needhiyin Vazhiyaip Puratta, Madiyilulla Paridhaanaththai Vaangugiraan.
24 gnaanam Buththimaanukku Munbaaga Irukkum; Moodanudaiya Kangalo Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharangalil Sellum.
25 moodapuththiran Than Pidhaavukku Salippum, Thannaip Petravargalukkuk Kasappumaanavan.
26 needhimaanai Thandampidikkiradhum, Niyaayanseygiravanaip Prabukkal Adikkiradhum Thagudhiyalla.
27 arivaali Than Vaarththaigalai Adakkugiraan; Vivegi Kulirndha Manamullavan.
28 pesaadhirundhaal Moodanum Gnaanavaan Endru Ennappaduvaan; Than Udhadugalai Moodugiravan Buththimaan Endru Ennappaduvaan.
